entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
